data.message: There is a companies facebook site that is wrongfully using someone else's information. I have contacted you all REPEATEDLY and of course! you have not responded. Facebooks "customer service"(or lack thereof) is completely worthless.

replies.message: Hey Jessi. If you come across a Page that violates the Facebook Terms, please report it. To submit a report, go to the Page you want to report and click the drop-down below the Page's cover. Then select Report Page and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. Thank you. -Chantal
I have done so multiple times and I keep getting the response that you guys see no problem with it.
This company is using my moms email and address. They also have photos from inside her home that she did not give permission for.
Something tells me I will get no response to this.
I agree, this is exactly why I'm NOT using Messenger
It's facebook I'm messaging. They should be able to figure out how to use it.
Why .....ur comment is no sent why
Facebook told me to privately message them to resolve the issue I'm having and they of course aren't responding to me.
So.what happen to my Facebook I told u.,.u can delete ur messages or what I think ..is full
My messages were recently deleted. I only have a couple in my inbox.
Big surprise. It's been 2 years and facebook never responded
